name: Scream of the Viking 2
description: Scream of the Viking 2 - is the second part of the story about the Viking. In the second part, you will see new even more dangerous and complex obstacles, traps and enemies. In this game as well as in the previous part, you also pass levels, overcome obstacles and barriers, collecting various subjects on the way, but already, playing for the son of the Viking from the first part. Be careful and cautious, because only one wrong step can lead to the Viking’s death. Think over options of development of events at each your step and this game won’t let you get bored.
